bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ high compaction molding system, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized chainstays, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Rotor Press-Fit BB86/30 sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano Dura Ace Di2, braze-on mount
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 Electronic STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 745 carbon/alloy, 45mm rims, DT Swiss Revoluion spokes 20/24H, precision sealed bearing hubs
Oval 700 forged & CNC'd w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ carbon top cover
Oval 910 full carbon w/ ergo drops, 31.8mm
Selle Italia SL Kit Carbonio w/ tubular manganese rails
